title: nubbly font
content:
Hi there, I was just wondering if is this a font or if its been drawn? It looks a bit Herb Lubalin...? Sorry for rubbish pic. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071130002224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nubblytwiglet_4504.jpg)

 [‹ Vintage Apple II ad typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20071130002224/http:/typophile.com/node/39549 "Go to previous forum topic") [American Apparel Ad Type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071130002224/http:/typophile.com/node/39545 "Go to next forum topic")
author: furryvision

comments.content:
Looks “Jim Parkinson”-ish, but couldn’t find it on his site…  
 [http://www.typedesign.com/info.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071130002224/http:/www.typedesign.com/info.html "http://www.typedesign.com/info.html")

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
The caps are Goudy Swash Bold Italic but the lowercase, obviously, is not...

The lowercase looks like a slightly modified Caslon Swash / Cabernet (lower x-height, longer bar on ’t’).

- Lex

The uppercase is probably Cabernet Italic as well.

- Lex
